sections.heading: funds; actions to recover; validity of contracts
sections.text: In all cases in which public money or funds belonging to the United States, an agency of the United States, the State of Nebraska, or any political subdivision in this state have been deposited or loaned to any person or persons, corporation, bank, ca

sections.heading: remedial, and should be given liberal construction. McIntosh v. Johnson, 51 Neb. 33, 70 N.W. 522 (1897).
